original_title: Don't Tell My Wife I Buttfucked Her Best Friend
overview: So the wife is outta town on business and I'm all alone at home when her best friend show's up unannounced. Being the gentleman that I am I offer her a cocktail... Well she came over for a different type of cock-tail!  I've fantasied about fucking her best friend forever! She's gonna get fucked like never before! I just hope this is a fantasy I can keep going on a regular basis! Yeah I know men are dogs but women love it doggy-style, so were even!
title: Don't Tell My Wife I Buttfucked Her Best Friend
